description: This mission involves the drone crossing the specified area in a diagonal direction at a high speed and at an altitude of 10 meters.

waypoints.description: Takeoff from the southwest corner of the operation area.
Navigate to the center of the operation area.
Continue in a diagonal direction towards the northeast corner of the operation area.
Land at the northeast corner of the operation area.

safety_considerations: Ensure that the drone maintains a consistent speed and altitude throughout the mission to avoid any potential obstacles.
Monitor the drone's battery level to ensure it has enough power to complete the mission.
success_criteria: The drone successfully crosses the operation area in a diagonal direction.
The drone maintains a consistent speed and altitude throughout the mission.
The drone lands safely at the northeast corner of the operation area.
original_command: atraviesa el perimetro directamente en diagonal a gran velocidad a una altura de 10 metros
